title: Arian Pasquali
description: AI Consulting, LLMs, Agents, RAG, and other personal notes.

items.title: The Real Bottleneck in Enterprise AI Adoption: Evaluation, Not Models
items.content_html: Explore the real challenges of AI adoption in enterprises, focusing on evaluation and expertise rather than just model performance.

items.title: How many samples do we need in our evaluation dataset?
items.content_html: Learn how to determine the required sample size for evaluating AI projects to ensure reliable results and informed decisions.

items.title: Why Qualitative Research Experts Are the Secret Weapon for Generative AI Evaluation
items.content_html: Explore how qualitative research experts can elevate generative AI evaluation with their unique skills and insights for human-centered AI design.

items.title: From Prompt to Context Engineering: Why Evaluation is the Real AI Differentiator
items.content_html: Explore the shift from prompt engineering to context engineering in AI, emphasizing domain-specific evaluation workflows for robust AI systems.

items.title: When LLM-as-Judge Metrics and User Preferences Diverge: Lessons from Real-World Evaluation
items.content_html: Explore how misalignment between LLM-as-Judge metrics and user preferences can impact evaluation accuracy and user satisfaction.

items.title: LLMs as Judges: Why Automated Metrics Aren't Enough
items.content_html: Explore why relying solely on LLMs as judges isn't enough. Understand the importance of user preference over automated metrics.

items.title: My Journey with Evaluation-Driven Development
items.content_html: Explore my evaluation-driven development approach for generative AI systems, focusing on user feedback and continuous improvement.
